"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a70227636872671e7f0300#post_54a70227636872671e7f0300
[bq="And Brother I Hurt People"]Shit guys, can you help out? I have to make a soundtrack for "Catcher in the Rye" with a minimum of ten songs, and I only have seven. They have go with either specific scenes in the book or the book's theme. Anyone have ideas? The genre of the song doesn't matter, nor does cursing - the teacher is pretty chill.[/bq]

i wish i could help, but i mostly focus on hip hop instrumentals

i mean trap music tends to talk about drugs and social struggle so thats that
